about_the_game:
Embark on Jennifer's Adventures in the City – Season 1 Awaits You!


Unlock the full narrative experience with the complete first season! Journey through each episode, now available, where you hold the reigns as the master architect of fate. With every moment comes a choice, and under your guidance, Jennifer will navigate a world where the stakes have never been higher. Your decisions will pave the road to her destiny, and the implications will echo throughout her tale with meaningful consequences.



As you take the helm of Jennifer's story, you'll be treated to a stunning visual and auditory feast that enhances your gaming experience:

Ultra High Definition Animation:

Every animation in the game is rendered beautifully in 4K, ensuring the crispest and most immersive visual experience, all at a smooth 60 frames per second.

Immersive Sound in Every Scene:

Every animated scene is brought to life with sound, adding depth and realism that will captivate your senses.

Global Accessibility:

To ensure Jennifer's story can be enjoyed by everyone, anywhere, the game now includes full translations in 30 languages, each crafted for clarity and ease of understanding.

Expansive World to Explore: Jennifer's world grows even larger with new locations to discover and intriguing new characters to meet. Each addition brings new opportunities and challenges that shape her journey.



Join Jennifer as she steps into a world ripe with possibility and danger. Your choices will not only determine her fate but also reveal the intricate dance between chance and destiny. Are you ready to discover the secrets and navigate the twists of fate that await Jennifer?

A life laltering finale for her: Brace yourself for a season-ending choice that will forever alter Jennifer's world. What will you decide?



The power is in your hands, forge a path for Jennifer and witness the impact that your decisions will have in her life.

content_descriptors.notes:
NOTIFICATION OF GRAPHIC CONTENT - ADULT ORIENTED AND POTENTIALLY DISTURBING MATERIAL

The game contains explicit, mature, and potentially distressing content. This includes, but is not limited to, vivid depictions of sexual engagements, consumption of alcoholic substances, utilization of narcotics, violent scenarios, and profane language. This content is designed specifically for a mature audience. 

Furthermore, the game may contain elements or scenarios that could be disturbing, especially for those currently experiencing emotionally challenging phases in life. Therefore, user discretion is highly advised.

Further to the aforementioned stipulations, it is of vital importance to denote that all characters featured within the narrative scope of the game are fictitious and are explicitly intended to represent individuals of legal adult age, as per universally accepted standards. Any explicit sexual engagements portrayed within the game are entirely consensual scenarios within the context of the fictitious narrative. The game, in no way, endorses or promotes non-consensual sexual activities. 

The game is a work of fiction and does not aim to mirror or endorse any illicit or harmful activities. All characters and scenarios are fictitious, and any likeness to actual individuals, living or deceased, is purely coincidental.

fullgame.name: Innocence Or Money Season 1 - Episodes 1 to 3

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit)
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Unlock the Complete First Season! Venture through every thrilling episode where you, as the master of fate, hold the power to shape Jennifer's journey. The stakes have risen, and the decisions she faces are fraught with consequences...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Estonian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Slovak, Slovenian
